title: Nasus is so annoying bruh
body: Every time I play against Nasus I make him lose lane. Every time the Nasus goes like 1-7-1 in lane. But late game he's two-shotting people? I've seen an 0-13 Nasus mid damn near one shotting every time he Q auto'd. He instantly has a huge presence late game for no reason. Sick of seeing this champ feed and win

replies.body: Nasus is one of the dumbest designs in the game because it is literally impossible under any circumstance to shut him down without being forced to divert a disproportionate amount of resources to doing so.
Nasus currently has a 47% WR on OPGG. OP? Not even in the most rudimentary sense of the word.
Then just because you beat him in lane doesn't mean you should ignore him and let him stack to the lategame lol.
